website_summaries.verdict: The majority of runners who have worn the Merrell Nova GTX have shown their satisfaction with their purchase. Positive comments surround the shoe in terms of comfort, support, and functionality. The fit of the shoe was also highly regarded by some. On the other hand, the Nova GTX received poor remarks on durability and craftsmanship, especially in the upper.Despite the few criticisms, many users still find the Nova GTX to be an average-performing shoe that is worth repurchasing in the future.
pros: The Merrell Nova GTX has a firm yet comfortable cushioning, according to numerous wearers
The majority of users find the waterproof feature of the shoe to be highly reliable
Several runners claim the Nova GTX to have excellent arch support
The shoe is described as lightweight, as well as easy to wear for extended periods, by many reviewers
A lot of comments mention the Nova GTX outsole’s excellent traction, especially on uneven and slippery terrain
The roomy forefoot area of the shoe is a positive aspect for various users
cons: A couple of purchasers have experienced getting a sore foot, particularly with pain at the sides, because of the upper material
According to some reviewers, the outsole is not very durable as it has started to develop holes within only a few months
Aside from the outsole, the upper’s resilience is also doubtful to a few users, as they claim the stitching has fallen apart quite easily

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of them and very light and comfy. I can feel the difference on my daily walks. These are by far the best walking shoes I've ever had. I was a bit wary about the sizing after reading some of the reviews , but I'm a size 9 & these fit as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting merrell for years, and have noticed the price go up but quality go down, these shoes were a fine example of this due to the fact that the fit felt good until trying to walk then the back slipped quite badly, I adjusted the laces and tightened as much as possible but still the same. I had to send them back as unwearable.

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainer
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely. Really comfortable. Not sure I'd run in them though.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I live Merrill, I have their boots and bought these replace some other hiking trainers that lasted 6 years. These are very light and comfortable, but sadly not in the slightest waterproof. Running in dew these leave my feet soaking wet. I wondered if it was sweat or something, so I tried them under the tap and the water just came straight through. I’m gutted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for walking the dog through the winter so I won’t be putting them through too much stress. The fit is slightly on the small side and they do let in a little moisture on a really wet day, but I find them supremely comfortable and I can rack up the miles without any issue due to their light weight. They look very smart and the mud is easily cleaned off. I will definitely buy another pair but I will buy them a half size larger in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Retford

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy actually. I like a shoe without too much heel padding, not full on bare foot style but a little more natural than most trainers. It took me a long time to find a shoe like this that is also waterproof so I'm very happy with these. They are nice and wide fitting and lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: split after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: initially very happy but after only 3 months light use as due to lockdown can't go hiking disappointed they have split in the exact same place on both shoes and are now no longer waterproof. expected far better quality from the brand and considering meant to be goretex. could understand if the use had been heavy hiking in undergrowth but not basic street walking

customer_reviews.title: Love Merrell So.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this Product so Far, but haven't tested them in the Lovely Wet Irish Weather Yet. Been Wearing Merrell shoes for Year's Now, so Hoping these live Upto all previous Purchases

customer_reviews.title: The best Merrell shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to use as walking shoes and they do the job admirably. I have owned several Merrell GTX shoe types and this is the pick of the bunch for me. Lightweight, well fitting, comfortable, completely waterproof, stylish looking and easy to clean. The one thing that remains to be seen is their durability, something that has been quite variable in my experience with Merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Best

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof !!!
customer_reviews.text: On damp short grass they make your feet wet !

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Nova GTX Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Built for running on moderate trails, this protective and durable shoe with gore tex is for those who want a more connected, fast experience on trails with debris and obstacles. Features: mesh and tpu upper burrito tongue wraps the foot to enhance a natural fit Hyperlock tpu film heel counter for security m select fresh antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odour breathable mesh lining eva removable footbed moulded nylon arch shank trail protect pad offers additional support off road compression moulded eva midsole for stability and comfort vibram megagrip for the best combination of traction and durability on wet or dry surfaces stack height (heel/toe): 29/25mm; footbed: 6.5mm; insole: 2mm; midsole: 14/10mm; sole: 1.5mm web, 5mm lug.
feature_bullets: Mesh and TPU Upper- Allows air to permeate the upper for a cool, comfortable environment.
Bonded InvisibleFit Construction- Lightweight, breathable protection.
GORE-TEX Waterproof Membrane- Complete waterproof protection that allows your foot to breathe.
Breathable Mesh Lining- Additional breathable layer within the shoe.
M-Select FRESH- Antimicrobial agents eradicate unwanted odours.
